Title: Verify agent search functionality in Agent Library
Description:
Ensure that users can search for agents in the Agent Library panel using the search bar.
This test case covers the search and filter capability for agent names and tags.
Preconditions: User is logged in and on the workflow builder page.
Test Steps:
1. Locate the Agent Library panel on the left side of the interface.
2. Enter a keyword (e.g., 'validation') in the search bar.
3. Observe the list of agents displayed.
Expected Result: Only agents matching the search keyword are displayed in the Agent Library panel.

Title: Verify workflow node connection functionality
Description:
Ensure that users can connect agents as nodes in the workflow canvas to define a process flow.
This test case covers the drag-and-drop and connection between workflow nodes.
Preconditions: User is logged in and on the workflow builder page.
Test Steps:
1. Drag an agent from the Agent Library panel to the workflow canvas.
2. Drag another agent to the canvas.
3. Connect the two agents by drawing a line between them.
Expected Result: The two agents are visually connected in the workflow canvas, indicating a process flow.

Title: Verify 'Run' button state based on workflow configuration
Description:
Ensure that the 'Run' button is enabled only when the workflow is properly configured with connected nodes.
This test case covers the enabling/disabling logic for the 'Run' button.
Preconditions: User is logged in and on the workflow builder page.
Test Steps:
1. Observe the 'Run' button when no nodes are connected.
2. Connect at least two agents in the workflow canvas.
3. Observe the state of the 'Run' button.
Expected Result: The 'Run' button is disabled when no nodes are connected and becomes enabled when a valid workflow is configured.

Title: Verify toggle functionality for 'Enable Manager LLM'
Description:
Ensure that users can toggle the 'Enable Manager LLM' switch and the workflow responds accordingly.
This test case covers the toggle switch interaction and its effect on the workflow.
Preconditions: User is logged in and on the workflow builder page.
Test Steps:
1. Locate the 'Enable Manager LLM' toggle at the top of the workflow canvas.
2. Click the toggle to turn it on.
3. Observe any changes in the workflow interface.
4. Click the toggle to turn it off.
Expected Result: The workflow interface updates to reflect the enabled/disabled state of the Manager LLM.

Title: Verify navigation through sidebar options
Description:
Ensure that users can navigate to different sections (Home, Build, Execute, Approve, Manage, Analytics) using the sidebar.
This test case covers sidebar navigation and page transitions.
Preconditions: User is logged in and on the workflow builder page.
Test Steps:
1. Click each sidebar option sequentially (Home, Build, Execute, Approve, Manage, Analytics).
2. Observe the content area for each navigation.
Expected Result: The content area updates to display the corresponding section for each sidebar option.

Title: Verify footer links functionality
Description:
Ensure that footer links (AI Notice, Terms and Conditions, Privacy Policy, Cookie Policy) are clickable and redirect to the correct pages.
This test case covers the accessibility and correctness of footer links.
Preconditions: User is logged in and on the workflow builder page.
Test Steps:
1. Scroll to the footer section.
2. Click each link (AI Notice, Terms and Conditions, Privacy Policy, Cookie Policy).
3. Observe the redirection for each link.
Expected Result: Each footer link opens the correct page or modal with the relevant information.
